name: Maze Magnitude
description:
Find the exit of the maze as quickly as you can, but be careful because sometimes the exit might not be where you think it is.

Controls:

To move use WASD or Arrow Keys, Space Bar to jump, Mouse to control the camera movement, Left Click to shrink, Right Click to grow and Escape to pause.

Notes:

-If the game is slow try changing the Graphics Quality settings at start up.

-This game was tested and developed in unity 3d on windows.

Developed by: Matthew Kingdon
